settings.title: Rural One Residential 4G
settings.description:
The Nomad Residential 4G Plan uses the nations best network with most reliable 4G speeds! with 300gb of data and no 5G coverage required! It comes with the Nomad Rural One Modem - The most rugged, reliable, and customizable rural modem ever!

Features:
- Download speeds up to 25Mbps
- 4G LTE
- Connect all Your Devices
- No Credit Check
- 300GB of Premium 4G LTE Network Access
- Anywhere You Are

settings.title: Nomad Cube Residential 5G
settings.description:
The Nomad Cube - Unlimited Edition is a new entry-level Wireless Modem with up to Unlimited Data!

Features:
- Works anywhere in the USA with up to unlimited 5G
- Download speeds up to 100Mbps!
- Easy self-install: activates in less than 60 seconds!
- Dual-band Wi-Fi 6 for up to 15 connected devices
- Ethernet LAN port to use your own router!
- Great for light gaming!

settings.title: Nomad Cube Travel 5G
settings.description:

settings.title: Nomad AIR Travel 5G
settings.description:
The Nomad Air is our travel-sized, portable wireless modem designed for use in your home and RV. The Nomad Air is small but mighty.

Features:
- Works anywhere in the USA with up to unlimited 5G
- Download speeds up to 250Mbps!
- Easy self-install: activates in less than 60 seconds!
- Dual-band Wi-Fi 6 for up to 30 connected devices
- Ethernet LAN port to use your own router!
- Great for light gaming!

settings.title: Nomad Air Travel Kit Travel
settings.description:
The Nomad Air Travel Bag includes a "one week" back up battery, up to unlimited wifi internet, and a fast charging solar panel!

Features:
- Nomad AIR Hotspot
- Nomad AIR Travel Bag
- One Week Backup Battery
- On/Off Switch With Blue Led
- Space Saver Power Adapter
- Fast Ac Wall Charger

settings.title: Nomad RAPTOR Travel
settings.description:
The Nomad Raptor is our fastest portable wireless modem designed for more demanding home, office, and gaming environments.

Features:
- Works anywhere in the USA with up to unlimited 5G and 4G LTE
- Download speeds up to 250Mbps!
- Easy self-install: activates in less than 60 seconds!
- Dual-band Wi-Fi 6 for up to 128 connected devices
- Multiple ethernet LAN ports and 1 Gbps WAN port that can also be used as a wireless backup system

settings.title: Nomad ARK Residential 5G
settings.description:
The Nomad Ark is our most powerful “outdoor” wireless modem, designed for use in your home, office and for gamers! The Ark is designed to pick up and provide up to unlimited internet anywhere you live or work, even in the most remote locations! *Professional outdoor installation recommended

Features:
- Designed to extend your wireless signal to anywhere in the USA with up to unlimited 5G and 4G LTE
- Download speeds up to 450Mbps!
- Made for professional outdoor installations
- Powerful 14 dBi outdoor antenna
- Provides a direct Ethernet LAN port to connect to your own network!

settings.title: Nomad ARK Power

settings.title: Step Two: Choose a modem
settings.description: Nomad Internet has no contracts! You may cancel your subscription with us at any time by simply returning your device and we never charge any cancellation fees! Easy, Simple, Clean!

settings.html:
14-Day Risk Free Trial! If it does not work, for any reason, send it back for a full refund. No questions asked.

Each membership includes a 14-day risk-free trial from the date you receive the DEVICE to test the device and service without risk. If the devic or service does not meet your expectations and you want a full refund for the modem, then let us know and after we receive the modem in proper condition we will refund you.

Are you looking for the best, most affordable way to surf the internet? Look no further than Nomad Internet! With our prepaid data plans, you can choose the amount of data and speed that is right for you - without having to commit to a long-term contract. Prices are low and connection speeds are fast, so it's easy to compare different plans and find the perfect one for your needs.

Whether you're a home user or a commercial customer, we have an inexpensive plan that meets your demands. We offer different plans on a monthly or prepaid basis so you can pick the one that fits your lifestyle and budget. By choosing Nomad Internet, you'll get all the power of an internet connection without spending too much - now that's a great choice!

At Nomad Internet, we strive to provide customers with the best service possible at an unbeatable price. We understand how important it is for everyone to have reliable access to the internet at a price they can afford - and that's why we work hard to ensure our customers get just that.

So if you're looking for cheap internet access with no strings attached, look no further than Nomad Internet! With our reliable connection speeds and range of flexible options, we guarantee satisfaction every time – no matter what type of user you are. Get connected today and start surfing like never before – with Nomad Internet!
